title: Possible paths of light through glass circle

content.description: A light ray R in medium I strikes a sphere of medium II with angle of incidence Ɵ​, as shown above. The figure shows five possible subsequent paths for the light ray.
content.question: Which path is possible if medium I is air and medium II is glass?

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
